entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
